text:
Juraj Herz (4 September 1934 – 8 April 2018) was a Slovak movie director, actor, and screenwriter. He has directed for both movies and television.
He was known for his 1971 movie "Petrolejové lampy" and for his 1976 movie "Den pro mou lásku".
Herz died on 8 April 2018 of respiratory failure in Prague at the age of 83.
